artist: Artist: Asher Brown Durand; Artist: after John Vanderlyn
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: On verso in pencil: \"His last work was the \'Ariadne\' after Vanderlyn. Published in 1835. A fit closing to his career as an engraver. A. B. Durand is the acknowledged head of the profession in America. \'American Engravers\'--Baker page 47.\"
signed: No; identified below plate \"Eng. by A. B. Durand\"
title: Ariadne
